alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 1:55AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of La Salle and Webb Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 155 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Las Vegas to 6 miles northeast of La Esperanza Ranch Airport to 18 miles northwest of Columbia Bridge. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Cotulla, Encinal, Ranchos Penitas West, Columbia Bridge, Fort Ewell Site, United South High School, Artesia Wells, Gardendale, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Callaghan, Texas A&M, Las Tiendas, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Unitec Industrial Park, La Esperanza Ranch Airport, Chupadera Ranch Airport, Ranchitos Las Lomas and Woodward. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 82. US Highway 59 between mile markers 800 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 722. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
